page.title: 12DARTINGTON HALL
page.content: Dartington Hall is a very old place,it has a very famous college which people from all over the world come to and do music, art and drama. John Holland built the Hall as a holiday home. J.H. was a very nasty piece of work. He was rich because he stole money from the people he had killed and probably stole all the servants from the people he had killed as well. Part of Dartington Hall has now got a bit of it used as the Devon Centre which is a computer place that has got about 20 computers and a couple of word processors. Dartington Hall church was moved in the last couple of centuries to its present position, nearer the centre of trade and the community. They left the tower behind because it was,and still is now, the law that you cannot move a church tower because it is a good lookout place.
